title: A National Program for Severe Asthma: The Canadian Severe Asthma Network

operands.value: adults (18 and older) with physiologically confirmed SA or mild-moderate asthma
followed by an asthma specialist for at least 6 months
must agree to have regular clinic visits (minimum 3-4 per year for SA, 1-2 for mild-moderate asthma)
must have good compliance with medications
must have minimum age of 18 years
malignancy and other significant medical conditions that will impact follow up within this program
those less than 18 years of age
concomitant interstitial lung disease, sarcoidosis, other significant lung disease
those who have had a transplant
unable to make appointments (every three to six months over 2 years)
those residing in another country or planned absence for more than one month

symPyExpression: And(Symbol('adults (18 and older) with physiologically confirmed SA or mild-moderate asthma'), Symbol('followed by an asthma specialist for at least 6 months'), Symbol('must agree to have regular clinic visits (minimum 3-4 per year for SA, 1-2 for mild-moderate asthma)'), Symbol('must have good compliance with medications'), Symbol('must have minimum age of 18 years'), Symbol('patients with asthma and COPD'), Not(Or(Symbol('concomitant interstitial lung disease, sarcoidosis, other significant lung disease'), Symbol('malignancy and other significant medical conditions that will impact follow up within this program'), Symbol('significant travel with work'), Symbol('those less than 18 years of age'), Symbol('those residing in another country or planned absence for more than one month'), Symbol('those who have had a transplant'), Symbol('unable to make appointments (every three to six months over 2 years)'))))
